Posts.Content: sharon68 wrote: Don't know the best place for this post ...might put it under reconstruction, too. My 5 yr MRI bilateral breast shows several "oil cysts"  along with an irregular shaped node under left armpit area,that they now want to ultrasound. I had a failed DIEP last yr with a 2 unit blood loss & horrific infection, needing debridement on that L side. Is it just left over from that ??? Has anyone else had anything like this show up on an MRI ?? I'm calling in the morning to make another US appointment :( Thanks for any input. Sharon F. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Oil Cysts sharon68 sharon68

Posts.Content: Feb 26, 2010 10:05PM sharon68 wrote: Thanks for the well wishes, NancyD I will have a FNA (fine needle aspiration ) of "an irregular shaped node" but the oil cysts will just stay put.  If they aspirated them, what is left of my " flap" would just shrink to nothing! I'm thinking this irregular shaped node is just part of that whole thing, too. We'll see on 3/3. Thanks again, Sharon F
